concept.title: What is subtraction of numbers?
concept.shortdesc: Here you will learn what is subtraction

conbody.p: To perform the task of subtraction, first you need to know what subtraction is. The term "subtraction" represents a mathematical operation. Subtraction is a process, an action that you perform using numbers. Subtraction allows you to find the difference between 2 numbers.
You use the minus (-) button to express the subtraction operation in the app.
In the subtraction process, you take a number and reduce it to a smaller number. That is, we take away one number from another.
